jobInfo.jobName: business analyst商业数据收集分析
jobInfo.postDescription:
PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES:
Describe the major activities of the job, emphasizing the end results which must be achieved (suggest listing from the most important task)
•	To conduct research utilizing open source intelligence, news aggregator sites, and litigation databases to discover relevant compliance risk.
•	To establish effective screening for alert adjudication, and providing risk suggestion. 
•	To upload information and data into database to deliver report
•	To cross check the data through multi channels to ensure report accuracy
•	To provide value-added service of report/project to meet customized needs
•	To support in other Reporting related services as and when required (e.g. database maintenance)
•	To responsible for business information and data gathering via phone interview with investigated companies according to compliance report fulfilment process and requirements

Notes:
* This is not an exhaustive list of all functions or responsibilities, the employee may be required to perform additional functions as necessary.
* SDBC reserves the right to revise the job description according to the business requirements.


EXPERIENCE, KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS, ABILITIES: 
List the experience, knowledge, skills and abilities necessary to do the job in a fully competent manner
•	Bachelor degree or above. Legal major is preferred, credit, financial or accounting major are also welcomed.
•	1 year due diligence experience and law firms experience is preferred. Fresh graduate is also welcomed.
•	Related experience for open source search methods is preferred, including open internet search, databases search, structured search strings
•	General knowledge of industry platforms is preferred
•	Quick learner, logical and efficient, good time management and prioritize skill
•	Good research and data pre-screening skill with strong business sense
•	Good command of English in reading and writing, at least CET 4
•	Good communication skill and strain capacity including telephone interview or cold call experience
•	Aggressive, accountable, able to work under pressure, good team player. Ability to work independently or as part of a team

关于邓白氏
邓白氏（Dun & Bradstreet）是全球数据和分析驱动的决策赋能机构。自1841年以来，我们致力于构建全球信任网络，协助客户将未知转化为信心、将风险转化为机遇、将潜力转化为增长。
邓白氏于1981年进入中国，我们将数据、技术和专业能力相结合，赋能客户业务决策，在商业信用与供应链、合规与反欺诈、销售与营销、普惠金融等多个应用场景中，帮助客户提高营收、降低成本、管控风险和实现数字化转型。同时，我们通过邓白氏注册和ESG注册服务帮助中国企业进行商业信息的验证、展示及全球同步，提升公司价值，满足准入要求，增强贸易互信，加速交易达成。
邓白氏的发展历程
邓白氏的创始人路易斯·塔潘(Lewis Tappan)于1841年在美国纽约开设了一家商业征信所， Robert Graham Dun于1859年接手公司运营。John M Bradstreet于1849年创立信用评估机构，并出版了全球第一本商业评级著作。1933年，两家公司合并组建为邓白氏公司(Dun & Bradstreet)。历经跨越3个世纪的发展，迄今，邓白氏业务运营覆盖200多个国家及地区，服务全球超过20万家客户。
邓白氏在华发展历程
邓白氏自1981年进入中国市场。40余年来，邓白氏秉承“扎根中国市场，服务中国企业”的理念，将全球能力与本土需求相结合，不断推出创新的产品和服务。 自2004年始，邓白氏在香港金融管理局的支持下，受香港银行公会和存款公司公会委托，负责经营香港商业信贷资料库(CCRA)。 2009年，邓白氏在本土推出邓白氏注册服务。2017年，邓白氏成为我国首家经央行备案的外资征信机构。 2021年，邓白氏通过“信息安全等级保护三级”认证测评。

更多信息，更深了解，欢迎进入邓白氏中国官网
jobInfo.address: 长沙岳麓区金茂广场北塔写字楼31楼
